page.title: 07TOURISM
page.content: BATTLE IS ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT HISTORIC SITES IN BRITAIN BECAUSE IT WAS THE SITE OF THE BATTLE OF HASTINGS. MUCH OF THE VILLAGE IS DEVOTED TO TOURISM. THE SERVICES AVAILABLE INCLUDE HOTELS AND GUEST HOUSES, PUBLIC HOUSES, GIFT SHOPS, CAFES AND RESTAURANTS. MOST VISITORS WALK AROUND THE BATTLEFIELD AND THE ABBEY RUINS AND THEN VISIT THE SHOPS AND CAFES. MOST OF BATTLE'S RESIDENTS FIND THE TOURISTS RATHER A NUISANCE BECAUSE THE SHOPS GET VERY CROWDED, BUT KNOW THAT THEY HELP TO MAKE BATTLE PROSPEROUS SO ARE REGARDED AS A NECESSARY EVIL. MANY MORE FACILITIES ARE NEEDED TO COPE WITH THE INCREASING TOURIST NUMBERS, SUCH AS MORE CAR PARKS AND A MORE FREQUENT BUS SERVICE TO HASTINGS.
